banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxurious jewelry product with a feminine and elegant design. The layout is split vertically: the left half features text layers including the main heading ("heading"), subheading ("subheading"), product description ("description"), price ("price"), rating ("rating"), and a call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta"). The right half displays the "product_image" of rose gold earrings on a soft gradient background. The background combines soft pink and peach tones with subtle circular accents and a wave graphic at the bottom for visual depth. The overall aesthetic is clean, stylish, and premium, ideal for a jewelry promotion.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: #E5756E  
- Deep Rose: #86423F  
- Soft Peach: #FFF1F1  
- Light Blush: #FFDAD5  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings featuring a delicate interplay of blush pink and shimmering crystal white tones. The dominant blush pink (#F6A5B4) creates a soft, feminine base, enhanced with rose gold accents (#E78E99) that frame the design. Clear white crystals (#FFFFFF) with subtle icy-blue undertones (#DCE9F6) highlight the sparkle and luxury of the piece. The colors are harmoniously blended: the rose pinks provide warmth while the crystals add brilliance, creating a balanced yet eye-catching look. For an advertisement banner, a light pink background with white and rose gold text accents will best enhance the jewelry’s signature tones.
